verses.verse: And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,
Avenge <S%H5358><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> of the <S%H4084>Midianites<s%>: <S%H310>afterward<s%> shalt thou be <S%H622>gathered<s%> unto thy <S%H5971>people<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H2502>Arm<s%> ye <S%H582>men<s%> from among you for the <S%H6635>war<s%>, that they may go against <S%H4080>Midian<s%>, to execute <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>'s <S%H5414>vengeance<s%> on <S%H4080>Midian<s%>.
Of every <S%H4294>tribe<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%>, throughout all the <S%H4294>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, shall ye <S%H7971>send<s%> to the <S%H6635>war<s%>.

So there were <S%H4560>delivered<s%>, out of the <S%H505>thousands<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, a <S%H505>thousand<s%> of every <S%H4294>tribe<s%>, <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H2502>armed<s%> for <S%H6635>war<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H505>them<s%>, a thousand of every <S%H4294>tribe<s%>, to the <S%H6635>war<s%>, them and <S%H6372>Phinehas<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, to the <S%H6635>war<s%>, with the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%> and the <S%H2689>trumpets<s%> for the <S%H8643>alarm<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%>.
And they <S%H6633>warred<s%> against <S%H4080>Midian<s%>, as <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>; and they <S%H2026>slew<s%> every <S%H2145>male<s%>.

And they <S%H2026>slew<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> the rest of their <S%H2491>slain<s%>: <S%H189>Evi<s%>, and <S%H7552>Rekem<s%>, and <S%H6698>Zur<s%>, and <S%H2354>Hur<s%>, and <S%H7254>Reba<s%>, the <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%>: <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> also the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1160>Beor<s%> they <S%H2026>slew<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> took <S%H7617>captive<s%> the <S%H802>women<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%> and their little <S%H2945>ones<s%>; and all their <S%H929>cattle<s%>, and all their <S%H4735>flocks<s%>, and all their <S%H2428>goods<s%>, they took for a <S%H962>prey<s%>.
And all their <S%H5892>cities<s%> in the places wherein they <S%H4186>dwelt<s%>, and all their <S%H2918>encampments<s%>, they burnt with <S%H784>fire<s%>.
And they <S%H3947>took<s%> all the <S%H7998>spoil<s%>, and all the <S%H4455>prey<s%>, both of <S%H120>man<s%> and of <S%H929>beast<s%>.

And they <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H7628>captives<s%>, and the <S%H4455>prey<s%>, and the <S%H7998>spoil<s%>, unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, and unto <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and unto the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, unto the <S%H4264>camp<s%> at the <S%H6160>plains<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, which are by the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> at <S%H3405>Jericho<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, and <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and all the <S%H5387>princes<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%>, went <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> them <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> was <S%H7107>wroth<s%> with the <S%H6485>officers<s%> of the <S%H2428>host<s%>, the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H505>thousands<s%> and the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H3967>hundreds<s%>, who <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H6635>from<s%> the service of the <S%H4421>war<s%>.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H2421>them<s%>, Have ye saved all the <S%H5347>women<s%> <S%H2421>alive<s%>?

Behold <S%H2007><s%>, these <S%H1961>caused<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, through the <S%H1697>counsel<s%> of <S%H1109>Balaam<s%>, to <S%H4560>commit<s%> <S%H4604>trespass<s%> against <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> in the <S%H1697>matter<s%> of <S%H6465>Peor<s%>, and so the <S%H4046>plague<s%> was among the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

Now therefore <S%H2026>kill<s%> every <S%H2145>male<s%> among the little <S%H2945>ones<s%>, and <S%H2026>kill<s%> every <S%H802>woman<s%> that hath <S%H3045>known<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> by <S%H4904>lying<s%> with <S%H2145>him<s%>.
But all <S%H802>the<s%> <S%H2945>women-children<s%>, that have not <S%H3045>known<s%> <S%H2145>man<s%> by <S%H4904>lying<s%> with <S%H2421>him<s%>, keep alive for yourselves.

And <S%H2583>encamp<s%> ye <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>: whosoever hath <S%H2026>killed<s%> any <S%H5315>person<s%>, and whosoever hath <S%H5060>touched<s%> any <S%H2491>slain<s%>, <S%H2398>purify<s%> yourselves on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> and on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, ye and your <S%H7628>captives<s%>.

And as to every <S%H899>garment<s%>, and all that is <S%H3627>made<s%> of <S%H5785>skin<s%>, and all <S%H4639>work<s%> of <S%H5795>goats<s%>' <S%H3627>hair<s%>, and all things made of <S%H6086>wood<s%>, ye shall purify <S%H2398>yourselves<s%>.

And <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H6635>war<s%> that <S%H935>went<s%> to the <S%H4421>battle<s%>, This is the <S%H2708>statute<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>:
howbeit the <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and the <S%H3701>silver<s%>, the <S%H5178>brass<s%>, the <S%H1270>iron<s%>, the <S%H913>tin<s%>, and the <S%H5777>lead<s%>,

everything <S%H1697><s%> that may <S%H935>abide<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%>, ye shall make to go <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%>, and it shall be <S%H2891>clean<s%>; nevertheless it shall be <S%H2398>purified<s%> with the <S%H4325>water<s%> for <S%H5079>impurity<s%>: and all that <S%H935>abideth<s%> not the <S%H784>fire<s%> ye shall make to go <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H4325>water<s%>.

And ye shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> your <S%H899>clothes<s%> on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, and ye shall be <S%H2891>clean<s%>; and <S%H310>afterward<s%> ye shall <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H4264>camp<s%>.
And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Take <S%H5375><s%> the <S%H7218>sum<s%> of the <S%H4455>prey<s%> that was <S%H7628>taken<s%>, both of <S%H120>man<s%> and of <S%H929>beast<s%>, <S%H499>thou<s%>, and Eleazar the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%>' houses of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%>;

and <S%H2673>divide<s%> the <S%H4455>prey<s%> into two <S%H2673>parts<s%>: between the men <S%H8610>skilled<s%> in <S%H4421>war<s%>, that went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H6635>battle<s%>, and all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%>.

And <S%H7311>levy<s%> a <S%H4371>tribute<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> that went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H6635>battle<s%>: <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5315>soul<s%> of <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%>, both of the <S%H120>persons<s%>, and of the <S%H1241>oxen<s%>, and of the <S%H2543>asses<s%>, and of the <S%H6629>flocks<s%>:
take <S%H3947><s%> it of their <S%H4276>half<s%>, and <S%H5414>give<s%> it unto <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, for <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>'s <S%H8641>heave-offering<s%>.

And of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>'s <S%H4276>half<s%>, thou shalt <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H270>drawn<s%> out of every <S%H2572>fifty<s%>, of the <S%H120>persons<s%>, of the <S%H1241>oxen<s%>, of the <S%H2543>asses<s%>, and of the <S%H6629>flocks<s%>, even of all the <S%H929>cattle<s%>, and <S%H5414>give<s%> them unto the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, that <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> as <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.

Now the <S%H957>prey<s%>, over and <S%H3499>above<s%> the <S%H4455>booty<s%> which the men <S%H5971>of<s%> <S%H6635>war<s%> <S%H962>took<s%>, was <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H6629>sheep<s%>,
and threescore and <S%H7657>twelve<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H1241>oxen<s%>,
and <S%H8346>threescore<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H2543>asses<s%>,

and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H5315>persons<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%>, of the <S%H802>women<s%> that had not <S%H3045>known<s%> <S%H2145>man<s%> by lying with <S%H4904>him<s%>.

And the <S%H4275>half<s%>, which was the <S%H2506>portion<s%> of them that went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H6635>war<s%>, was in <S%H4557>number<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> thousand and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6629>sheep<s%>:
and <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>'s <S%H4371>tribute<s%> of the <S%H6629>sheep<s%> was <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and threescore and <S%H7657>fifteen<s%>.
And the <S%H1241>oxen<s%> were <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>; of which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>'s <S%H4371>tribute<s%> was threescore and <S%H7657>twelve<s%>.

And the <S%H2543>asses<s%> were <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%>; of which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>'s <S%H4371>tribute<s%> was <S%H8346>threescore<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%>.
And the <S%H120>persons<s%> were <S%H8337>sixteen<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>; of whom <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>'s <S%H4371>tribute<s%> was <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5315>persons<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> the <S%H4371>tribute<s%>, which was <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>'s <S%H8641>heave-offering<s%>, unto <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, as <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.
And of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>'s <S%H4276>half<s%>, which <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H2673>divided<s%> off from the <S%H582>men<s%> that <S%H6633>warred<s%>

(now the <S%H5712>congregation<s%>'s <S%H4275>half<s%> was <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>, <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> hundred3967, 4480 <S%H6629>sheep<s%>,
and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H1241>oxen<s%>,
and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H2543>asses<s%>,
and <S%H8337>sixteen<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H5315>persons<s%>),

even of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>'s <S%H4276>half<s%>, <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H270>drawn<s%> out of every <S%H2572>fifty<s%>, both of <S%H120>man<s%> and of <S%H929>beast<s%>, and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them unto the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, that <S%H8104>kept<s%> the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; as <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.

And the <S%H6485>officers<s%> that were over the <S%H505>thousands<s%> of the <S%H6635>host<s%>, the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H505>thousands<s%>, and the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H3967>hundreds<s%>, came <S%H7126>near<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>;

and they <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, Thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> have <S%H5375>taken<s%> the <S%H7218>sum<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> that are under our <S%H3027>charge<s%>, and there <S%H6485>lacketh<s%> not one man of <S%H376>us<s%>.

And we have <S%H7126>brought<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>'s <S%H7133>oblation<s%>, what every <S%H376>man<s%> hath <S%H4672>gotten<s%>, of <S%H3627>jewels<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, <S%H685>ankle-chains<s%>, and <S%H6781>bracelets<s%>, <S%H2885>signet-rings<s%>, <S%H5694>ear-rings<s%>, and <S%H3558>armlets<s%>, to make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for our <S%H5315>souls<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H2091>gold<s%> of <S%H4639>them<s%>, even all wrought <S%H3627>jewels<s%>.

And all the <S%H2091>gold<s%> of the <S%H8641>heave-offering<s%> that they offered <S%H7311>up<s%> to <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, of the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H505>thousands<s%>, and of the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H3967>hundreds<s%>, was <S%H8337>sixteen<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%>.
<S%H582><s%>( For the men of <S%H6635>war<s%> had taken <S%H962>booty<s%>, every man for <S%H376>himself<s%>.)

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H2091>gold<s%> of the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H505>thousands<s%> and of <S%H3967>hundreds<s%>, and <S%H935>brought<s%> it into the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>, for a <S%H2146>memorial<s%> for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
